entry.title: Learning Sprint - An Experiment
entry.summary:
Description

Eve and Ray embarked on a two week experiment they're calling a Learning Sprint.

4 hours a day, 5 days a week over two weeks they set goals and executed on them.

What did they learn? Did it work? What fun facts did they pick up along the way â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Eve and Ray embarked on a two week experiment they're calling a Learning Sprint.

4 hours a day, 5 days a week over two weeks they set goals and executed on them.

What did they learn? Did it work? What fun facts did they pick up along the way?

They'll explain in their thrilling talk for all skill levels.
